content: Hi. When joining a thread we get a https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/thread/type.Result.html. The doc there suggest using unwrap, but I suspect the error message would be poor since Box<Any> as Debug does not give particularly useful output. Would using resume_unwind instead make sense? Even though catch_unwind isnâ€™t used (except maybe by std)
libstd does use catch_unwind internally on the newly spawned thread: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/0beba9333754ead8febc5101fc5c35f7dcdfaadf/library/std/src/thread/mod.rs#L473
resume_unwind would make sense to me. There is likely no need for another backtrace.
yeah if you want to propagate the panic resume_unwind a good choice
